summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 TOYOTA SIENNA. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE REAR DIFFERENTIAL COUPLING FAILED TO FUNCTION. COLONIAL TOYOTA DEALER (550 GEORGE WASHINGTON HWY, SMITHFIELD, RI 02917, (401) 723-0972) INDICATED THAT THE PART NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE TOYOTA RAV4 VARIOUS YEAR MODELS HAD THE SAME PART; HOWEVER, THE CONTACT'S MODEL VEHICLE WAS NOT YET INCLUDED IN THE RECALL. THE CONTACT WAS UNCERTAIN IF THE VEHICLE WOULD BE REPAIRED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 86,000.
